reviewText: Great video, but if you don't have a tv outdoors it's hard to watch and follow along! Would be better as an audio/cd one can listen to over a cd player/speaker.

I already had experience with water workouts, so wasn't expecting much new, so I was surprised to find it very helpful and I picked up a lot of tips and inspiration.  You don't need to watch it every time, but it is good to review it every so often to add diversity to your workout.  Recommended.
Although the first DVD sent to me just didn't not work - disc error, Water Works sent me another one and I am enjoying it.  Thank you.
